009package Ch06_CornerDetection;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013
014import java.util.List;
015
016import ij.IJ;
017import ij.ImagePlus;
018import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
019import ij.gui.Overlay;
020import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
023import imagingbook.common.corners.Corner;
024import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
025import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector.Parameters;
026import imagingbook.common.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
027import imagingbook.common.corners.MopsCornerDetector;
028import imagingbook.common.corners.ShiTomasiCornerDetector;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
031
032/**
033 * This plugin demonstrates the use of gradient corner detectors.
034 * It calculates the corner positions and shows them as a vector overlay
035 * on top of the source image.
036 * 
037 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
038 * @see MopsCornerDetector
039 * @see ShiTomasiCornerDetector
040 * 
041 * @author WB
042 * @version 2022/03/30
043 */
044public class Find_Corners implements PlugInFilter {
045        
046        private enum DetectorType {
047                Harris, MOPS, ShiThomasi;
048        }
049        
050        private static DetectorType Algorithm = DetectorType.Harris;
051        private static int MaxCornerCount = 0;                          // number of corners to show (0 = all)
052        private static Parameters Params = new Parameters();
053
054        private static double CornerMarkSize = 1.0;
055        private static double CornerMarkStrokeWidth = 0.25;
056        private static BasicAwtColor CornerMarkColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
057        
058        private ImagePlus im;
059        
060        @Override
061    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
062        this.im = im;
063        return DOES_ALL;
064    }
065    
066        @Override
067    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
068        
069                if (!showDialog(Params)) {
070                        return;
071                }
072                
073                GradientCornerDetector detector = null; 
074                switch (Algorithm) {
075                case Harris:
076                        detector = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, Params);
077                        break;
078                case MOPS:
079                        detector = new MopsCornerDetector(ip, Params);
080                        break;
081                case ShiThomasi:
082                        detector = new ShiTomasiCornerDetector(ip, Params);
083                        break;
084                }
085                
086                List<Corner> corners = detector.getCorners();
087                
088                // create a vector overlay to mark the resulting corners
089                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
090                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
091                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(CornerMarkStrokeWidth, CornerMarkColor.getColor()));
092                
093                int cnt = 0;
094                for (Corner c : corners) {
095                        ola.addShape(c.getShape(CornerMarkSize));
096                        //IJ.log(c.toString());
097                        cnt++;
098                        if (MaxCornerCount > 0 && cnt >= MaxCornerCount) break;
099                }
100                
101                im.setOverlay(oly);
102                
103                // (new ImagePlus("Corner Score", detector.getQ())).show();
104    }
105    
106        private boolean showDialog(Parameters params) {
107                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
108                
109                gd.addEnumChoice("Detector type", Algorithm);
110                addToDialog(params, gd);
111                gd.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", MaxCornerCount, 0);
112                gd.addNumericField("Corners display size", CornerMarkSize, 1);
113                gd.addEnumChoice("Corner color", CornerMarkColor);
114                
115                gd.showDialog();
116                if(gd.wasCanceled())
117                        return false;
118                
119                Algorithm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(DetectorType.class);
120                getFromDialog(params, gd);
121                MaxCornerCount = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
122                CornerMarkSize = gd.getNextNumber();
123                CornerMarkColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
124                
125                if(gd.invalidNumber() || !params.validate()) {
126                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input");
127                        return false;
128                }       
129                return true;
130        }
131
132}
